Text: I need to hand out those flyers...
Wait... \n Aren't you the \n Gravity Queen!?
Yep, that's me.
You've come back to us! \n And just in time, I need \n help.
Help with what?
Advertising my store! \n I printed up a ton of \n hip flyers.
They are pretty cool.
They have to be if I \n want to make a big \n splash.

If you could do that 
 shifting thing you do 
 and hand them out 
 for me.
THAT'S what you \n needed help with?
I've even got a \n uniform ready...
Just between us, only \n someone as cute as you \n could pull it off.
Well, when you \n put it that way...
I'll do it! \n Give me the flyers.
Pass Out Flyers to Passersby
Flyers Remaining
Store Owner: \n Hand them out in lines for other stores.
It feels like I'm never going to finish...
Finally halfway done!
Just a few more now...
Here's a flyer!
Take a flyer!
We're having a special opening sale!
Check out the coupons inside!

Try to pass them out as 
 fast as you can to the 
 people commuting 
 downtown.
I'll radio you if I hear \n where there are a lot of \n people.
Got it! \n Here I go.
Here you go!
I handed all \n your flyers out.
You did good out there, \n Gravity Queen!
We've got a sudden rush \n of new customers.
I think they're your \n handiwork.
Oh yeah, \n look at all of 'em!
I think my store's gonna \n be in business for \n a while now.

Here's something for 
 your trouble. And a 
 little extra for the 
 good work.
Oh wow, thank you!

Hey, wonder if I can 
 keep the uniform? 
 Never know when I 
 might need it.
I handed all \n your flyers out.
Thanks a bunch!
With your help, \n we've got customers \n lined out the door.
I think I can make a \n go of this.
Here's a little \n something for \n your trouble.
Oh wow, \n thank you!

Hey, wonder if I can 
 keep the uniform? 
 Never know when I 
 might need it.
I handed all \n your flyers out.
Took you long enough...
Did you goof off on the \n way or something?
I didn't "goof off," \n I take helping people \n very seriously.
It wasn't easy, \n you know.
Well, I guess I at least \n got a few new customers \n out of it...
Here's a little \n something for \n your trouble.
Thanks.

Hey, wonder if I can 
 keep the uniform? 
 Never know when I 
 might need it.
